comments: Previous terms are described one by one in succession. Next terms are 118, 256, 564 and 1262 digits long.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..9
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Look and Say Sequence
prog: (Haskell)a045981 n = a045981_list !! (n-1)a045981_list = 1 : f 1 [] where   f x zs = y : f y zs' where     y = read (concatMap show zs')     zs' = zs ++ [a045918 x]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 28 2014
author: _Anthony Joseph Splendora_
extensions: More terms from _Patrick De Geest_, Jun 15 1999.
